content:
//注意函数合并

function onOpenWindPopupWindows_All(obj, popupType, windowTileType)
{
    if (popupType == 42 )//打開公會信息欄時
    {
    sq_OpenPopupWindow(217, 0, 0, 0);//同時打開公會告示欄
    }
}


function onOpenPopupWindow_Swordman(obj, popupType, windowTileType)//每个职业打开窗口时执行的函数
{
    if(!obj) return;

onOpenWindPopupWindows_All(obj, popupType, windowTileType)
}

function onOpenPopupWindow_Fighter(obj, popupType, windowTileType)
{
    if(!obj) return;

onOpenWindPopupWindows_All(obj, popupType, windowTileType)
}

function onOpenPopupWindow_Gunner(obj, popupType, windowTileType)
{
    if(!obj) return;

onOpenWindPopupWindows_All(obj, popupType, windowTileType)
}

function onOpenPopupWindow_Mage(obj, popupType, windowTileType)
{
    if(!obj) return;

onOpenWindPopupWindows_All(obj, popupType, windowTileType)
}

function onOpenPopupWindow_ATGunner(obj, popupType, windowTileType)
{
    if(!obj) return;

onOpenWindPopupWindows_All(obj, popupType, windowTileType)
}

function onOpenPopupWindow_Thief(obj, popupType, windowTileType)
{
    if(!obj) return;

onOpenWindPopupWindows_All(obj, popupType, windowTileType)
}

function onOpenPopupWindow_ATFighter(obj, popupType, windowTileType)
{
    if(!obj) return;

onOpenWindPopupWindows_All(obj, popupType, windowTileType)
}

function onOpenPopupWindow_DemonicSwordman(obj, popupType, windowTileType)
{
    if(!obj) return;

onOpenWindPopupWindows_All(obj, popupType, windowTileType)
}


function onOpenPopupWindow_Priest(obj, popupType, windowTileType)
{
    if(!obj) return;

onOpenWindPopupWindows_All(obj, popupType, windowTileType)
}


function onOpenPopupWindow_ATMage(obj, popupType, windowTileType)
{
    if(!obj) return;

onOpenWindPopupWindows_All(obj, popupType, windowTileType)
}


function onOpenPopupWindow_ATSwordman(obj, popupType, windowTileType)
{
    if(!obj) return;

onOpenWindPopupWindows_All(obj, popupType, windowTileType)
}

sqr/extend_function/onopenpopupwindow.nut 函数合并进去就可以了，文本第一个fun粘贴进去，其余都要合并
